attributes.action: To Stop Locking Down The UK Population
attributes.additional_details: I would like small independent companies to remain open and continue to sell as big companies like Sainsburys are allowed to continue to sell everything in their stores. The rules make no sense
attributes.background: We are being locked down then opened up this will cripple the small independent companies and also will effect the mental health of thousands of people in the UK. I'm asking the Government to Not Lock us down for a 3rd time
